creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three full columns of calligraphy on square sheet; one character on fourth column; signature at left center; red relief seal at UR; gourd shaped red seal at LL
markings: URC, square relief, in red; LLC, gourd-shaped relief, in red; on back, bottom edge, in pencil: [Godo Ishikawa]
title: Autumn Poem
